rules.description: Press left-shift+caps_lock to enable default profile

to.shell_command: '/Library/Application Support/org.pqrs/Karabiner-Elements/bin/karabiner_cli' --select-profile 'goku'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "open: Safari"'
